summary: Visa status lookup application - displays applicant details (name, visa type, approval status, date) when searching by reference number and email
architectural_notes: Application uses reference number and email as lookup keys for visa status
Sample data: reference 4906670766 + jr321134@gmail.com returns Rojee Sharma, Work Visa Approved, current date

existing_features.title: Ensure the AustralianVisaCheckPage displays all retrieved fields (applicant name, visa type, status, approval date) in a clear, readable format matching the Australian Government website style

new_feature_requests.summary: Display applicant details (Rojee Sharma, Work Visa Approved, today's date) for reference 4906670766 and email jr321134@gmail.com

When a user enters reference number '4906670766' and email 'jr321134@gmail.com' on the visa check page, display the following details: applicant name 'Rojee Sharma', visa type 'Work Visa', status 'Approved', and today's date as the approval date
